mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.name, p.code, p.url, p.type, p.parent_id, p.order_no, p.icon FROM t_permission p JOIN t_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id JOIN t_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.type = 'menu' ORDER BY p.parent_id, p.order_no

SELECT DISTINCT p.code FROM t_permission p JOIN t_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id JOIN t_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.code IS NOT NULL AND p.code != ''
